text: HDMI dongle is in the left desk drawer.
Spare AA batteries are in the kitchen cabinet above the microwave.
VPN is Proton; Tailscale MagicDNS enabled for glad0s and qutiepi.
1080 Ti runs VL; 1070 does chat/speech; K80 handles vision pre/post.
Home Assistant uses Wyoming proxy for STT/TTS bridging.
